CustomField.description: If this is checked in a customer account the Actions tab in OM should list all actions associated with the opportunity - not just PRIME actions. Show blank value for actions which don't have a PRIME type
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is checked in a customer account the Actions tab in OM should list all actions associated with the opportunity - not just PRIME actions. Show blank value for actions which don't have a PRIME type
CustomField.label: List All Actions
